Reference

All functions

bind_rows()

Bind simulation list into dataframe

extract_plot()

Extract plot(s) from ggplot

format_cropr()

Format simulations and observations from CropR format to a format usable by CroplotR

plot(<cropr_simulation>) autoplot.cropr_simulation()

Plot situations by group of simulation

plot(<statistics>)

Plot statistics

n_obs() mean_obs() mean_sim() sd_obs() sd_sim() CV_obs() CV_sim() r_means() R2() SS_res() Inter() Slope() RMSE() RMSEs() RMSEu() nRMSE() rRMSE() rRMSEs() rRMSEu() pMSEs() pMSEu() Bias2() SDSD() LCS() rbias2() rSDSD() rLCS() MAE() ABS() MSE() EF() NSE() Bias() MAPE() FVU() RME() tSTUD() tLimit() Decision()

Model quality assessment

save_plot_pdf()

Save CroPlotR plots

save_plot_png()

Save CroPlotR plot

split_df2sim()

Split data.frame into Cropr format

`[`(<cropr_simulation>)

[ method for cropr_simulation

summary(<cropr_simulation>)

Summary statistics of simulations
